DOC.brief_summary: A study Assess Pharmacokinetics Rosuvastatin Simvastatin administer alone combination Fostamatinib .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Pharmacokinetics Rosuvastatin Simvastatin When Administered Alone Combination With Fostamatinib
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label , Non-randomized , 2-Period , Fixed Sequence , Single-center Study Assess Pharmacokinetics Rosuvastatin Simvastatin Healthy Subjects Administered Alone Combination Fostamatinib 100 mg Twice Daily .
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date , write informed consent , prior studyspecific procedure Volunteers male female age 18 55 year weight least 50 kg body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . Male volunteer willing use barrier contraception , ie , condom , day first dose 2 week last dosing IP . Females must negative pregnancy test screen admission unit , must lactate , must non childbearing potential , confirm screening . History clinically significant disease disorder , opinion Investigator , may either put volunteer risk participation study , influence result volunteer 's ability participate study . History presence GI , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug . Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure , trauma within 4 week first administration IP judge Investigator . Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , hematology , urinalysis result judge Investigator . Any clinically significant abnormal finding vital sign judge Investigator
